DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect Inquiry base stress reduction ( IBSR ) meditation technique level burnout wellbeing among teacher .
DOC.detailed_description: Teachers ' burnout well-known phenomenon personal professional implication . The current study investigates effect inquiry base stress reduction ( IBSR ) technique burnout well-being among teacher .
DOC.criteria: All teacher work 'Begin ' highschool , Rosh Hayin , Israel agree sign inform consent form Teachers previous experience IBSR technique
